API¶

Core Classes¶

class the_perfect_hello_world.hello_world.HelloWorld(greeting='Hello', punctuation='!')[source]¶

Configurable “hello world” message formatter and printer.

greet(target='World')[source]¶

returns a formatted greeting message as a string

print_greeting(target='World', file=None)[source]¶

prints the formatted greeting to a file, or stdout by default.

Utility Functions¶

the_perfect_hello_world.hello_world.parse_hello_world_args(argv)[source]¶

returns Namespace of parsed command line arguments for the Hello World CLI
